首先获取经济插件，然后在用withdraw方法

replies.author: 小烦
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 小烦 于 2016-9-24 23:41 编辑 

public static Economy econ = null;private boolean setupEconomy() {      RegisteredServiceProvider<Economy> economyProvider = getServer().getServicesManager().getRegistration(Economy.class);        econ = (Economy)economyProvider.getProvider();            return econ != null;          }econ.withdrawPlayer(player.getName(), money);
